alert.note: Alert for Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 15 at 11:32AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 1215 PM MST... At 1131 AM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Downtown Scottsdale, or near Paradise Valley, moving northwest at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Phoenix, Glendale, Scottsdale, Tempe, Peoria, Paradise Valley, New River, Sun City West, Sun City, Cave Creek, Tempe Marketplace, Papago Park, Piestewa Peak Park, Deer Valley Airport, Salt River Indian Community, North Mountain Park, Downtown Peoria, Downtown Scottsdale, Arrowhead Mall and Downtown Glendale. This includes the following highways... AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 145 and 155. AZ Interstate 17 between mile markers 203 and 230. AZ Route 51 between mile markers 1 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cave Creek, New River; Central Phoenix; Deer Valley; East Valley; North Phoenix, Glendale; Northwest Valley; Scottsdale, Paradise Valley
